channel.title: Delete ABHA on ABDM Sandbox Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Delete ABHA on ABDM Sandbox Documentation

item.title: Delete ABHA via Aadhaar Otp
item.description: Delete ABHA via Aadhaar Otp Overview of the functionality Users may delete his/her ABHA (Health ID) permanently. Following will happen if you delete your ABHA (Health ID) : Your ABHA (Health ID) will be permanently deleted, along with all your demographic details . You will not be able to retrieve any information tagged to your ABHA (Health ID) in future. You will never be able to access ABDM applications or any health records over the ABDM network with your deleted ABHA (Health ID).
